title: Court Kacheri
overview: In a chaotic district court of rural India, the son of a legendary lawyer wrestles with his unwanted inheritance while cases expose the messy truth behind local justice.

tv.episodeOverview: As Param awaits his visa, he uncovers key evidence in the divorce case. Torn between loyalty and justice, he defies his father to reveal the truth, igniting a courtroom war. For the first time, he feels he's made a difference. Meanwhile, Suraj, burdened by guilt over a shady deal, faces a crushing fallout with Japtap - shattering his dream of independence.
